fairness.title: Fairness
fairness.description: Positions aim for an evaluation within ±0.5 pawns (±50 centipawns) with no forced mates.

legality.title: Legality
legality.description: Generated positions adhere to standard chess rules (e.g., no kings in check initially).

placement.title: Placement
placement.description: Each side starts with 8 pawns. Pieces are placed randomly but restricted to their own half/middle of the board initially.

analysis.title: Analysis
analysis.description: Stockfish engine provides evaluation and checks for fairness. Win chances are estimated based on evaluation.
